topic.title: ZeroChat with Zeromail
topic.body: Hello i try to make a "site" with zerotalk and zeromail to chat with my friends and sent mail.Are these possible ?

topic.title: Error when try to combine Zeromail With simple ZeroChat`

1_149Lc5r63oF2drRtd1pokm5G7M49DhhMji.body: I want to make one-page site with zero-talk and zeromail.
Thanks I try to developed that without using promise.js .I used pure javascript

> [o4zw5vmpoz5hz78z](#comment_103_1KTjPe9MxoYkcXj78GuZgCcj3R3f3Twh7r): well you just clone zeromail and integrate zerochat in it because thats way it will be easier
